summary: Completed frontend testing of DMM application manual strategy creation workflow. Strategy creation works perfectly, but approval list display has rendering issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Strategies not displaying in approvals list despite successful API calls
ui_bugs.details: API returns 200 with data, but frontend shows 'No strategies found'. Issue in renderItemPreview or items mapping logic.

integration_issues.issue: Cannot test approval workflow due to list display issue

passed_tests: Manual strategy creation form - all fields working
Strategy save to backend - API integration successful
Navigation between Strategy and Approvals pages
Success message display after strategy creation

success_percentage.frontend: 70% - Strategy creation works, approval list display fails

action_item_for_E1: Fix Approvals component rendering logic in /app/dmm-frontend/src/pages/Approvals.jsx - strategies are not displaying in the list despite successful API responses. The renderItemPreview function or items mapping logic needs debugging. Backend APIs are fully functional.
